dataUsageVerificationText: Your data will be saved so that you can access it later.

questions.0: Does your child look at you when you call his/her name?
questions.1: How easy is it for you to get eye contact with your child?
questions.2: Does your child point to indicate that he/she wants something?
questions.3: Does your child point to share interest with you?
questions.5: Does your child follow where you're looking?
questions.6: If you or someone else in the family is visibly upset, does your child show signs of wanting to comfort them?
questions.7: Would you describe your childâ€™s first words as unusual?
questions.8: Does your child use simple gestures?
questions.9: Does your child stare at nothing with no apparent purpose?

codeExplanation: In order to display results after the test, you need to enter the test code next time. So make sure to save it.
needHelp: You may consider seeing a healthcare professional for the child you are testing for.
noNeedHelp: You may not need to see a healthcare professional for the child you are testing for.
dataPermissionMessage: You must give permission to solve the test.
